title: Ghana Consumer Price Index (CPI)
description: Consumer Price Index CPI in Ghana decreased to 140.06 points in September from 176.30 points in August of 2022. Consumer Price Index CPI in Ghana averaged 50.39 points from 1997 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 176.30 points in August of 2022 and a record low of 4.47 points in October of 1997. In Ghana, the Consumer Price Index or CPI measures changes in the prices paid by consumers for a basket of goods and services. This page provides - Ghana Consumer Price Index (CPI) - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Ghana Statistical Service
